Text: The formatting on this is weird
Rename the .cbr to .rar and extract all the .jpg files and format to your needs it's left untouched for the best possible quality.

Do you happen to know why I keep getting pages on the left and on the right as if the "display two pages" option is ticked but one of them is blank?
Also,I can't get the images to fit the whole screen and it's really a pain to read when they only fit the height of the screen.
These images are coming straight from Windows 8 Comixology at a high resolution that must be the trouble your having.
